lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Harvesting in areas not actually under water could also be further delayed due to dampness in the earth, the sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Fresh, heavy rains caused further damage to the Argentine 1986/87 coarse grains crop in the week to yesterday, particularly in Buenos Aires province, trade sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The production forecast for 1986/87 sunflowerseed has been lowered to between 2.2 and 2.4 mln tonnes, against 2.3 to 2.6 mln tonnes the previous week, making it 41.5 to 46.3 pct lower than the record 4.1 mln tonnes produced last season.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Harvesting in areas not actually under water could also be further delayed due to dampness in the earth, the sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Fresh, heavy rains caused further damage to the Argentine 1986/87 coarse grains crop in the week to yesterday, particularly in Buenos Aires province, trade sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The production forecast for 1986/87 sunflowerseed has been lowered to between 2.2 and 2.4 mln tonnes, against 2.3 to 2.6 mln tonnes the previous week, making it 41.5 to 46.3 pct lower than the record 4.1 mln tonnes produced last season.
